title: Lamp Chakra Energy Crystals - USB
description: The Chakra Energy Crystal Lamp illuminates your space with chakra crystals' balancing glow and energy.
cleaned_text: Lamp - Chakra Energy Crystals The Chakra Energy Crystal Lamp with a USB cord, adapter and wooden base illuminates your space with chakra crystals' balancing glow and energy. Contents: - Clear Quartz (4.5-5.5 cm / 1.8 - 2.2). - Tiger's Eye, Rose Quartz, Carnelian, Green Aventurine (1.5-2.0 cm / 0.6-0.8). - Amethyst, Apatite, Black Obsidian (2.0 - 3cm / 0.8-1.2). - LED light. - USB cord. - Adapter, with switch. - Wooden lamp base (10 x 3.9 cm). - Gift Boxed Chakra Crystals - Crown: Clear Quartz (inspire insight). - Third Eye: Amethyst (enhance intuition). - Throat: Apatite (encourage expression). - Heart: Rose Quartz, Green Aventurine (radiate love) - Solar Plexus: Tiger's Eye (awaken ambition) - Sacral: Carnelian (enhance the will). - Root: Black Obsidian (connect to the earth).
